text.config.lump-config.title: Less Ugly Mob Proofing Settings
text.config.lump-config.option.beaconPro:
Sets the effective range of the §5Amethyst Beacons§r, 
note that §nthis value is controlled by the server§r, 
changing it in this menu only applies to §esingleplayer§r.
text.config.lump-config.option.subchunks:
How many subchunks around the player will 
the light overlay be shown for (in all directions).

How many subchunks around the player will 
the light overlay be calculated for. 
Should be §nat least equal to the render distance§r above. 
§7§o(Calculating a larger area in advance helps reduce 
newly loaded chunks from showing the wrong overlay color 
for a moment, while the player is moving between chunks.)§r
text.config.lump-config.option.ticksPerO:
Lower values are more demanding, but makes 
the overlay more responsive for light updates.
§7§oIncrease for better performance.§r
text.config.lump-config.option.ticksPerB:
Lower values are more demanding, but makes the 
overlay more responsive when placing or breaking beacons. 
§7§oIncrease for better performance, especially for multiplayer.§r
